name: DOCX_TOOLS__MARKDOWN_TO_DOCX
description: Converts a string of Markdown text into a Microsoft Word (.docx) file and saves it as an artifact.

markdown_content.description: The Markdown content to be converted into a document.

output_filename.description: The desired filename for the final .docx artifact (e.g., 'Weekly_Report.docx').

title.description: The title to be placed at the top of the Word document.
